pl.bristleback.server.bristle.api.action

Interface ActionInterceptor<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticationInterceptor, AuthorizationInterceptor, LogoutInterceptor

    public interface ActionInterceptor<T>
    Every action can be intercepted by any number of action interceptors. To be considered as an interceptor, beans must be annotated with Interceptor. Interception context object is resolved by the ActionInterceptorContextResolver, defined in Intercept annotation. Additionally, each interceptor can be annotated by the spring annotation Order to control order of their invocations.

    Created on: 20.01.13 11:52

    Author:
    Wojciech Niemiec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActionInterceptorContextResolver<T> getContextResolver() 
      void intercept(ActionInformation actionInformation, ActionExecutionContext context, T interceptorContext)
      Intercepts action execution.

    • Method Detail

      • intercept

        void intercept(ActionInformation actionInformation,
             ActionExecutionContext context,
             T interceptorContext)
        Intercepts action execution. The latter execution stage is, the more information is available in ActionExecutionContext object. Interceptor may modify or change various action execution information, as well as cancel response sending by calling ActionExecutionContext.cancelResponseSending() method.
        Parameters:
        actionInformation - meta information about executed action.
        context - action execution context object, created for each action execution.
        interceptorContext - interception execution context, created for each interception operation.

      • getContextResolver

        ActionInterceptorContextResolver<T> getContextResolver()
